page.title: 10ELPHINSTONE GALA
page.content: WHEN INTERVIEWED,ENGRID ELLIS TREASURER OF ELPHINSTONE CHILDRENS GALA FUND SAID SHE HOPES THEY RAISE BETWEEN Â£700 AND Â£800.SHE ALSO SAID THERE SHOULD BE A GALA BECAUSE THE CHILDREN HAVE NOTHING ELSE AND IT BRINGS THE VILLAGERS CLOSER.EVERY YEAR THE GALA IS HELD IN JULY.THEY HAVE IT ON THE BIG FOOTBALL PITCH.THEY HAVE A BIG PARADE WITH A PIPE BAND,A FLUTE BAND AND THE MAJORETTES.THERE ARE LOTS OF PEOPLE IN FANCY DRESS AND THEY CAN WIN PRIZES.A TRACTOR PULLS A TRAILOR FULL OF CHILDREN.DURING THE DAY THERE ARE OBSTACLE RACES,FLAT RACES AND FOOTBALL.THERE IS A PET SHOW AND FAIRGROUND STALLS.
